amendment.description: An amendment numbered 72 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit funding for the CBDC (Central Bank Digital Currency) Working Group led by the Department of the Treasury.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mooney amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mooney amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mooney amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.
